CHAT.comment: CAROL M. BROWNER, ADMINISTRATOR OF THE ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY, ET AL., Petitioners, v. AMERICAN TRUCKING ASSOCIATIONS, INC., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:14 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GENERAL SETH P. WAXMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EDWARD W. WARREN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JUDITH [*36] L. FRENCH ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF SETH P. WAXMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:14 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
